item.title: New HUD Icons
item.dc:creator: Open_Source_Forever
item.description:
Acoma:

You mean the little HEV icon that depletes downward when you lose energy?
That’d require a bit of extra coding

As for making the mp5 grenades appear over the 9mm ammo, you might be able to use some source hud editor to alter the hudlayout.res file

I tried that. It ended up looking bad. I’m also referring to the digits of the reserve pool tracking number being the same height/width as the digits in the magazine tracker, as well as the health cross/HEV guy being to the left of their respective meters. There should be 2 numbers for each ammunition value, separated by a “/” (for instance, the Glock magazine tracker would say “17/17”, with the 1st number being the ammunition units remaining in the magazine & the 2nd number being the magazine capacity. The reserve pool tracker would do the same thing). There should be a solid straight bar between the magazine tracker & the reserve pool tracker. There should be a solid straight bar between the health meter & HEV meter. The HEV depleting icon could use the “magazine depletion tracker”, but modified to have 10 sections. Finally, the HEV meter should be modified to still be visible when at 0.

Read full topic

item.title: New HUD Icons
item.dc:creator: Acoma
item.description:
Open Source Forever:

Would you be able to do an update that adds a Half-Life 1-style hit point/armor fuel tracker & a Half-Life 1-style ammunition tracker, complete with the Machine Gun Grenade tracker being above the Machine Gun bullet tracker, allowing for separate magazine/reserve pool tracking for the Machine Gun Grenades (to account for the grenade launcher reload animation)?

You mean the little HEV icon that depletes downward when you lose energy?
That’d require a bit of extra coding

As for making the mp5 grenades appear over the 9mm ammo, you might be able to use some source hud editor to alter the hudlayout.res file

Read full topic
